original_text: Hiram cut pictures of cherubs, lions and palm trees on the sides of each cart and on the handles. He cut pictures where there was a space for them. There were also shapes of leaves all around.
korean_text: 버팀대 판과 옆판에는 각각 빈 곳을 따라 그룹들과 사자와 종려나무를 아로새겼고 또 그 둘레에 화환 모양이 있더라

sentences.original_text: Hiram cut pictures of cherubs, lions and palm trees
sentences.korean_translation: 히람은 그룹과 사자와 종려나무 그림을 새겼고

sentences.original_text: on the sides of each cart
He cut pictures where there was a space for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그림을 넣을 공간이 있는 곳에 그림을 새겼다

sentences.original_text: There were also shapes of leaves all around
